english.segment1: Broken widow. And fatherless child. I've turned my back on you. I missed the point here. I over analyzed it. Somewhere I missed the clues
english.segment2: Are you ready for love?. Are ready for real emotion?. Are you too comfortable to join the revolution?
english.segment3: Oh, this love is revolutionary. When it's inside of you. It's just so simple. I never realized it. I never had a clue
english.segment4: I fall down. I fall down to my knees. Fall down and weep. With joy
